sentences.en: Before his election to the presidency, Mitterrand had enjoyed a long and varied career.
sentences.cn: 在当选总统之前，密特朗有过一段漫长的职业生涯，干过很多不同的工作。

sentences.en: During his presidency many changes took place.
sentences.cn: 在他任职期间发生了许多变化.

sentences.en: Even the presidency was handed to him on a plate.
sentences.cn: 他甚至连总统之位都是得来全不费工夫。

sentences.en: He is set to pulverise his two opponents in the race for the presidency.
sentences.cn: 他决心在总统竞选中彻底击垮他的两个对手。

sentences.en: He looked on the governorship as a stepping - stone to the presidency.
sentences.cn: 他把州长职位看成是谋求总统职位的进身之阶.

sentences.en: He was already preparing his run for the presidency.
sentences.cn: 他已经开始为参选总统做准备了。

sentences.en: I propose him as a candidate for the presidency.
sentences.cn: 我提名他为总统候选人.

sentences.en: Of course, the ultimate authority remained the presidency.
sentences.cn: 当然，拥有最高权力者依然是总统。

sentences.en: one of the leading candidates for the presidency
sentences.cn: 总统职位的主要候选人之一

sentences.en: Roosevelt was elected four times to the presidency of the US.
sentences.cn: 罗斯福四次当选美国总统。

sentences.en: She has been nominated for the presidency.
sentences.cn: 她已经获得了董事长职位的提名。

sentences.en: She looked on the governorship as a stepping - stone to the presidency.
sentences.cn: 她把州长之职当作进身总统职位的踏脚石.

sentences.en: The presidency is beginning to appear a political irrelevance.
sentences.cn: 总统一职似乎正在沦为政治上的摆设。

sentences.en: There were few real improvements during his presidency.
sentences.cn: 在他的总统任期内几乎没有什么真正的改善。

sentences.en: They have been calling the Presidency decision a backroom deal.
sentences.cn: 他们称总统人选问题是个幕后交易。

sentences.en: Two candidates are emerging as contestants for the presidency.
sentences.cn: 两位候选人最终成为总统职位竞争者.

words.tran_cn: 总统（或董事长、会长、大学校长等）的职位（任期）；管辖；支配

trans.tran_cn: 总统，总统的任期，管辖，支配
trans.tran_en: the position of being the president of a country or organization, or the period of time during which someone is president
